channel.title: Comments on: Rant: Who’s/Whose Normal?
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: The N-Word | Collidoscope Berlin

item.description: […] I posted the Who’s/Whose Normal article a few weeks ago, I expected the “N-word” of interest to be Neger, a term that […]
item.content:encoded: […] I posted the Who’s/Whose Normal article a few weeks ago, I expected the “N-word” of interest to be Neger, a term that […]

item.title: By: collidoscope berlin
item.dc:creator: collidoscope berlin
item.description:
Copied from facebook:
Nice rant. I've been on this planet for quite some time and am still puzzled by the term "normal". I suppose if we do the math and try to work out a statistical average to describe normal, we might find it described a Mandarin speaking Chinese woman whose grandmother was of Indian origin.
item.content:encoded:
Copied from facebook:

Nice rant. I’ve been on this planet for quite some time and am still puzzled by the term “normal”. I suppose if we do the math and try to work out a statistical average to describe normal, we might find it described a Mandarin speaking Chinese woman whose grandmother was of Indian origin.
